channel.title: How To Make Npc's Walk Ik its prob easy just ive never done it XD
channel.description: Well, The Title Pretty Much says it all i want it so the npcs automatically walk without being attacked just between a certain area so it doesnt go through walls lol =D soz if theres not enuf info or anything or cuz the grammars all fked i had to go to school and typed this as fast as i could summary: Npc's Walking like shops on runescape=D any help will be really appreciated ttyl =D ill check this after school so please help =)
